div.head: Stance of animals
div.ab: Not only with iron points but with melted wax, animals are secured on the earthen slab. Wash them first in clear water, once they have died in the mixture

ab.add:
of vinegar & urine,
& with a sponge
purge their mouth,
eyes,
and the
head of
the slaver
which
comes out,
for
the sand
would never
set well
there and
would become
lumpy.

div.ab: If you want to make them keep their mouths open, put in a little bit of spinet string, which will not take up space.
